## Source: khulnasoft-package-analysis (a0ff5ff243d8b36f1ce0a81e2d9c46c3c78f81cb69b2770b2e53d66895e510e9)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'sa11y-monorepo' @ 2.2.1 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
